summary: i really want to get into the spidey (daredevil?? spidertorch??? idk but they all seem,, really cool) fandoms, but i have no...
question: i really want to get into the spidey (daredevil?? spidertorch??? idk but they all seem,, really cool) fandoms, but i have no clue where to start. any help??
answer:
Yeah absolutely! Comics can be really super confusing to get into, and I was super overwhelmed when I decided I first wanted to get into spider-man lmao.

Comics aren’t very linear, they have a lot of different side-series and one-shots and crossovers and different timelines, so it can be pretty confusing. Spider-man especially, because he’s one of Marvel’s most popular superheroes and has been around for over 50 years now.

There’s a lot of ways you could read spider-man. I’ve found THIS website very helpful for me because it has a list of the chronological reading order for spider-man, including special series or appearances in other comics. It doesn’t actually host the comics though.

I’ve been reading on THIS site, though be warned it does have some pretty horrible ads, and it looks like it’s missing issues 701-788 (??? not sure why, but that’s not my problem for now lmao I’m still only on issue 15 or something).

Another simpler option is that you could read just the main timeline for the Amazing Spider-Man, and then just go back and read any other series that interest you later.

THIS wikipedia article has all the Spider-Man titles, and is a pretty good resource but there’s A LOT there, so it can be kinda overwhelming though.

Anyways, hope that answered some of your questions!! Feel free to send me any more asks if you have any other questions, or dm me if you would prefer. At the end of the day, I think the easiest way to get into a comic fandom is to find a starting point and just dive in head first. Let me know if you want any fic recs too :D

summary: Peter:Hi Mr. Thor! I can’t believe I get to meet you! You’re my favorite avenger, well after Mr. Stark of course, but still, the...
body:
Peter:Hi Mr. Thor! I can’t believe I get to meet you! You’re my favorite avenger, well after Mr. Stark of course, but still, the way you can make lightning appear and we can’t forget your hammer-

Thor: …I’m your favorite avenger? Even if I’m chubby and fat?

Peter, instantly latching on to Thor like a koala: of course Mr. Thor sir! It just makes you more huggable!

Thor, slowly hugging back: more huggable.. thank you Peter I suppose it does

summary: 26 with Peter Parker x reader please!
question: 26 with Peter Parker x reader please!
answer:
“Does it hurt?” Peter helped you sit down - on the roof of a hospital, of all places - and immediately ripped his mask off, kneeling next to you.

You groaned in pain, reaching down and grabbing hold of your ankle. “Yeah,” you told him, face scrunching up in slight pain for a moment. Peter bit his lip nervously.

“Karen, call Mister Stark.”

“Calling Mister Stark.”

The beeping of the phone ringing filled the empty silence around you, and, for once, you couldn’t be mad at Peter for calling Tony. Usually, if ever you accompanied Peter on one of his patrols and you winded up getting injured, you’d beg for him not to call for fear of the man never letting you out again. Nevertheless, you figured now was as good a time as any to let him know how badly you’d messed up your ankle.

“Pete. Everything alright?” You looked up as Tony’s voice sounded from Peter’s suit. The kid looked as nervous as he could be, if you were being honest, which would have been amusing were you not in agonising pain.

“Uh, I-I don’t know,” Peter said, and you shook your head.

“Everything’s fine, Tony. I just busted up my ankle, is all.”

The both of you heard a dry chuckle on the other end of the phone and what sounded like a bit of shuffling round. “’Is all’,” he replied, sarcasm dripping from his voice. “How’d you manage that?”

“It was my fault,” Peter piped up. “I told her she could make the jump from one building to the other, but she almost fell and I had to swing down to catch her…” He winced at Tony’s sigh.

“Stay on the ground, kids. Isn’t that what I said?”

Peter moved to assure him. “No, no, I just said-”

“It’s your fault, yeah, I know. Except, I’m saying the blame lies with the both of you. Tell me, Y/N, how’d you get on the roof in the first place? I’m guessing Peter forced you up there, right?”

You rolled your eyes. “Tony, I’m in pain, here.”

“Yeah, and I’m in the car and on my way. But, you’re getting it once I find you. You can’t endanger your life like this.” You could hear the scolding tone in his voice as both you and Peter glanced at each other, wincing. “Peter, have you got something to wrap her ankle with?”

Peter stood to his feet, shuffling inside a pocket in his suit you didn’t even know he had and pulling out a roll of bandages. You rose an eyebrow. “What the hell, Pete?”

Your best friend gave you a look. “Oh, come on, Y/N; this isn’t the first time something like this has happened. I come prepared on every patrol.” He knelt back down next to you and sighed. “I’ve got bandages, Tony.”

“Right, okay. You know how to wrap her ankle with it?”

“No, but I can try.”

“Peter!” you said indignantly. “I’m not letting some novice wrap my ankle!”

You could practically hearTony roll his eyes. “Just let him do it, Y/N. It’s not difficult, and I’ll be there soon, anyways.”

You sighed, glancing at Peter before nodding. “Fine, but be careful. It hurts.” Peter offered a small smile before moving down to your feet and slowly working on taking off your shoe and sock and wrapping your ankle - which was all shades of purple and brown, now - in the bandage. Granted, it was a difficult process, and by the time he’d finished it you had silent tears running down your cheeks, but he immediately went to hug you as soon as he’d finished.

“Everything done? You both alright? Y/N?”

“I’m fine,” you said quietly, a sniffle accompanying it.

“I’m sorry, Y/N,” Peter said, leaning his head against yours. “I didn’t mean to hurt you.”

“It’s okay, Pete. Thank you for helping.”

“No problem,” he said with a smile. He reached over to tuck a strand of hair behind your ear, eyes widening and hand recoiling immediately as you scrunched your neck up and moved away from him. 

“Did I hurt you?”

“No, no…”

“What’d you do?” Tony questioned, and you shook your head frantically at Peter as he frowned a little confusedly at you.

“I just-”

“Peter, no!”

“-touched her ear.”

A deep chuckle sounded from the other end of the phone. “Ah, you touched her… spot.”

Honestly, for a moment, Peter was in complete helplessness as to what exactly that meant, but it didn’t take long to dawn on him. A smile slowly spread across his lips. “Don’t tell me you’re ticklish here, too,” he said, reaching up to touch your ear again and laughing when you shook your head violently to escape his hand. He shouldn’t really have been surprised - there wasn’t an ounce of skin on you that wasn’t ticklish - but your ear? It was strange. Still, it was cute, all the same…

“I’m not,” you said, rolling your eyes and shuffling backwards, careful to keep your ankle as still as possible.

Tony scoffed. “’Course not. Tell that to the squeals still ringing in my ears from last week.”

Peter laughed. “We all wondered where that noise was coming from!”

“I hate you, Tony,” you grumbled. “Hope you know that.”

“Oh, I’m sure. You can kill me when I get there, but, for now, you gotta focus on keeping your ankle still, so no tickling, Mister Parker, alright?”

Peter smiled. “Okay. For now.”

“I agree on that.”

All you could do was face palm.

“Pete. Everything alright?” You looked up as Tony’s voice sounded from Peter’s suit. The kid looked as nervous as he could be, if you were being honest, which would have been amusing were you not in agonising pain.

“Uh, I-I don’t know,” Peter said, and you shook your head.

“Everything’s fine, Tony. I just busted up my ankle, is all.”

The both of you heard a dry chuckle on the other end of the phone and what sounded like a bit of shuffling round. “’Is all’,” he replied, sarcasm dripping from his voice. “How’d you manage that?”

“It was my fault,” Peter piped up. “I told her she could make the jump from one building to the other, but she almost fell and I had to swing down to catch her…” He winced at Tony’s sigh.

“Stay on the ground, kids. Isn’t that what I said?”

Peter moved to assure him. “No, no, I just said-”

“It’s your fault, yeah, I know. Except, I’m saying the blame lies with the both of you. Tell me, Y/N, how’d you get on the roof in the first place? I’m guessing Peter forced you up there, right?”

You rolled your eyes. “Tony, I’m in pain, here.”

“Yeah, and I’m in the car and on my way. But, you’re getting it once I find you. You can’t endanger your life like this.” You could hear the scolding tone in his voice as both you and Peter glanced at each other, wincing. “Peter, have you got something to wrap her ankle with?”

Peter stood to his feet, shuffling inside a pocket in his suit you didn’t even know he had and pulling out a roll of bandages. You rose an eyebrow. “What the hell, Pete?”

Your best friend gave you a look. “Oh, come on, Y/N; this isn’t the first time something like this has happened. I come prepared on every patrol.” He knelt back down next to you and sighed. “I’ve got bandages, Tony.”

“Right, okay. You know how to wrap her ankle with it?”

“No, but I can try.”

“Peter!” you said indignantly. “I’m not letting some novice wrap my ankle!”

You could practically hearTony roll his eyes. “Just let him do it, Y/N. It’s not difficult, and I’ll be there soon, anyways.”

You sighed, glancing at Peter before nodding. “Fine, but be careful. It hurts.” Peter offered a small smile before moving down to your feet and slowly working on taking off your shoe and sock and wrapping your ankle - which was all shades of purple and brown, now - in the bandage. Granted, it was a difficult process, and by the time he’d finished it you had silent tears running down your cheeks, but he immediately went to hug you as soon as he’d finished.

“Everything done? You both alright? Y/N?”

“I’m fine,” you said quietly, a sniffle accompanying it.

“I’m sorry, Y/N,” Peter said, leaning his head against yours. “I didn’t mean to hurt you.”

“It’s okay, Pete. Thank you for helping.”

“No problem,” he said with a smile. He reached over to tuck a strand of hair behind your ear, eyes widening and hand recoiling immediately as you scrunched your neck up and moved away from him. 

“Did I hurt you?”

“No, no…”

“What’d you do?” Tony questioned, and you shook your head frantically at Peter as he frowned a little confusedly at you.

“I just-”

“Peter, no!”

“-touched her ear.”

A deep chuckle sounded from the other end of the phone. “Ah, you touched her… spot.”

Honestly, for a moment, Peter was in complete helplessness as to what exactly that meant, but it didn’t take long to dawn on him. A smile slowly spread across his lips. “Don’t tell me you’re ticklish here, too,” he said, reaching up to touch your ear again and laughing when you shook your head violently to escape his hand. He shouldn’t really have been surprised - there wasn’t an ounce of skin on you that wasn’t ticklish - but your ear? It was strange. Still, it was cute, all the same…

“I’m not,” you said, rolling your eyes and shuffling backwards, careful to keep your ankle as still as possible.

Tony scoffed. “’Course not. Tell that to the squeals still ringing in my ears from last week.”

Peter laughed. “We all wondered where that noise was coming from!”

“I hate you, Tony,” you grumbled. “Hope you know that.”

“Oh, I’m sure. You can kill me when I get there, but, for now, you gotta focus on keeping your ankle still, so no tickling, Mister Parker, alright?”

Peter smiled. “Okay. For now.”

“I agree on that.”

All you could do was face palm.

summary: when they are just starting out johnny is not particularly interested in peter's hobby. air gymnast. sounds beautiful, right?...
body:
au, where peter has no superpowers.

when they are just starting out johnny is not particularly interested in peter’s hobby. air gymnast. sounds beautiful, right? after about a month of their relationship storm still goes to one of the boyfriend’s speeches. after what he sees, he no longer misses one.

whenever peter goes on stage, johnny’s heart stops. despite the fact that he himself often saves the city by endangering himself, peter’s life stands by storm much higher than his own. he does not tell peter how he is afraid for him. he just goes to his every performance - every - hoping that nothing will happen, and if he does, he will be able to catch him before it is too late.

one day, when they sit in the living room and watch some stupid comedy, peter, throwing chips in his mouth, enthusiastically tells us that he became one of the candidates for the main performance at the upcoming city concert. stunts right under the sky, a hundred feet high, without insurance. johnny thinks she will get a heart attack but she only smiles brightly in response. he gently rubs the shoulders of boyfriend and secretly hopes that peter will not get this chance.

of course he gets it. johnny didn’t doubt it, despite how he did not want it. peter receives a hug and a walk in the park as a reward, and johnny a few sleepless nights.

johnny has been avoiding talking about the concert all week and peter doesn’t talk much about it with him. on friday, he invites him to his speech: proudly brings him a ticket and johnny doesn’t say that in any case he has already been called - he, after all, is the human torch. in the evening before peter goes to training, johnny jokingly throws: “just do not slip.” peter laughs, johnny wants to cry.

on the way to the concert, storm buys a bouquet of orange chrysanthemums - flowers, the love for which Peter explains, by their similarity with the flame. johnny is a little embarrassed every time, but does not show it. this time he is looking forward to the moment to hand them over. if only peter could take them in hand.

peter’s perfomance is at the very end, and for a couple of hours Johnny allows himself to forget why he came here at all.

but the moment is coming. the light goes out. peter goes on stage.

he is not wearing a shirt, only gymnastic pants. the light barely illuminates his face and johnny thinks that this is so that viewers don’t see the artist’s fear, although johnny alone seems to be afraid here.

peter begins to rise. it seems that it is easy - to pull up on satin ribbons with your hands but johnny knows how much training is behind this. around silence, the orchestra doesn’t play music, only increasing the tension among the audience. johnny tries not to blink or even breathe.

all spotlights are directed to the gymnast. someone is chatting from behind but johnny doesn’t even have the strength to tell them to shut up - he is too focused. he looks point blank. looks like he can freeze time with his eyes. for a second - one second - he blinks.

and then Peter falls.

johnny rises from the spot.

in a swirling fall, Peter flies a second, two, three, and then, clinging to the tape, stops his body ten inches from the floor. johnny freezes. he cannot accept it. someone knocks him on the thigh, urging him to sit down, and he limply flops back into the chair.

the hall applauds, then pauses, Peter continues the performance.

orange chrysanthemums are lying somewhere between the rows, at johnny’s feet. a tear gleams at the corner of his eye and he bashfully wipes it away.

leter. good that he survived. now, after the concert, johnny will be able to kill him with his own hands.

sorry for mistakes

tags: peter is a prequel meme bastard and i absolutely do NOT accept criticism
summary: ok peter is absolutely into star wars prequels memes. he and ned greet each other across the hall with HELLO THERE, and GENERAL...
body:
ok peter is absolutely into star wars prequels memes. he and ned greet each other across the hall with HELLO THERE, and GENERAL KENOBI every. single. day. whenever may lectures him about breaking curfew he mutters “so this is how liberty dies…” when MJ sides with peter in a discussion, ned screams “YOU TURNED HER AGAINST ME”…. before any avengers training session, peter says “this is where the fun begins….” 

he’s absolutely speechless when tony says he can’t be an avenger before he turns 18 but he can train with them, followed by “you are on this council, but we do not grant you the rank of master”

blog.name: ryemjay
blog.title: big yeet
blog.description: i make prompts with my life

summary:
Ok so Story Time
So I've always wanted the most Tumblr-esque reputation at my school, like with a shitty nickname that sounds...
body:
Ok so Story Time

So I’ve always wanted the most Tumblr-esque reputation at my school, like with a shitty nickname that sounds like it came out of a tumblr post and I have actually achieved it.

I was with my girlfriends, who were hiding behind the cafeteria. One of my friend’s crushes was sitting on the deck outside the cafeteria with a group of his guy friends. Well, one of these guys happens to be another one of my gay friends. So I unhid myself for a brief moment to make eye contact with him. While his friends were turned away I would naruto run stealthily to his location and show him a random shirtless photo of Tom Holland, before retreating to my hiding place. After this occured six times my friend asks rather loudly “wHERE DO YOU GET ALL THESE PHOTOS???” and his friends turned to look at me. Honestly, it was quite overwhelming, so I yet again Naruto ran to my hiding spot just to gather myself before returning.

But as I begin my seventh assault, I see the boys look up at me and say:

“Here she comes,,,,

The Spider Man Dealer!”

And honestly I’ve never felt so proud and confident in my entire life.

I am the Spider Man Dealer

But as I begin my seventh assault, I see the boys look up at me and say:

The Spider Man Dealer!”

And honestly I’ve never felt so proud and confident in my entire life.

I am the Spider Man Dealer
trail.content:
Ok so Story Time

So I’ve always wanted the most Tumblr-esque reputation at my school, like with a shitty nickname that sounds like it came out of a tumblr post and I have actually achieved it.

I was with my girlfriends, who were hiding behind the cafeteria. One of my friend’s crushes was sitting on the deck outside the cafeteria with a group of his guy friends. Well, one of these guys happens to be another one of my gay friends. So I unhid myself for a brief moment to make eye contact with him. While his friends were turned away I would naruto run stealthily to his location and show him a random shirtless photo of Tom Holland, before retreating to my hiding place. After this occured six times my friend asks rather loudly “wHERE DO YOU GET ALL THESE PHOTOS???” and his friends turned to look at me. Honestly, it was quite overwhelming, so I yet again Naruto ran to my hiding spot just to gather myself before returning.

But as I begin my seventh assault, I see the boys look up at me and say:

“Here she comes,,,,

The Spider Man Dealer!”

And honestly I’ve never felt so proud and confident in my entire life.

I am the Spider Man Dealer
